page.title: 05Education
page.content: {PROJECT TRIDENT}was created in 1972 as a charitable trust to help young people adapt to the world beyond the family and the classroom.Some 30,000 students are involved up and down the country in a partnership between education,industry and the voluntary sector.WORK EXPERIENCE.Students engage in 3 weeks unpaid work with a local employer.Their teachers co_operate with managers to give advice and encouragement.Students are,hopefully, then better able to appreciate the choices before them and to think constructively about the future. {ROTHMANS COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL}opened in Sept 1983 following the amalgamation of Infant/Junior schools. 10 classes are housed separately in two buildings. A broad, balanced, integrated curriculum caters for the individual needs of each child.
